00060 const DeformingDomainWrapper::MeshCharacteristic DEFAULT_METRIC_TYPE = 
00061   DeformingDomainWrapper::SHAPE;
00062 
00063 const bool DEFAULT_CULLING = true;
00064 const double DEFAULT_CPU_TIME = 0.0;
00065 const double DEFAULT_MOVEMENT_FACTOR = 0.01;
00066 const int DEFAULT_INNER_ITERATIONS = 2;
00067 const char DEFAULT_CURVE_TAG[] = "MesquiteCurveFraction";
00068 const DeformingCurveSmoother::Scheme DEFAULT_CURVE_TYPE = 
00069   DeformingCurveSmoother::PROPORTIONAL;

00071 DeformingDomainWrapper::DeformingDomainWrapper()
00072   : metricType( DEFAULT_METRIC_TYPE ),
00073     initVertexCoords(""),
00074     doCulling(DEFAULT_CULLING),
00075     cpuTime(DEFAULT_CPU_TIME),
00076     movementFactor(DEFAULT_MOVEMENT_FACTOR)
00077   {}
00078 
00079 DeformingDomainWrapper::~DeformingDomainWrapper() {}

00081 void DeformingDomainWrapper::store_initial_mesh( Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00082 {
00083   TagVertexMesh tool( err, mesh, false, initVertexCoords ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00084   InstructionQueue q;
00085   q.add_tag_vertex_mesh( &tool, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00086   q.run_instructions( mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00087   if (initVertexCoords.empty())
00088     initVertexCoords = tool.get_tag_name();
00089 }
00090 
00091 void DeformingDomainWrapper::set_vertex_movement_limit_factor( double f )
00092 {
00093   assert(f > 0.0);
00094   movementFactor = f;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void DeformingDomainWrapper::run_wrapper( Mesh* mesh,
00098                                           ParallelMesh* pmesh,
00099                                           MeshDomain* geom,
00100                                           Settings* settings,
00101                                           QualityAssessor* qa,
00102                                           MsqError& err )
00103 {
00104   if (movementFactor <= 0) {
00105     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_STATE,
00106       "Optimization will not terminate with non-positive movement factor %f",
00107       movementFactor);
00108     return;
00109   }
00110 
00111     // Move initial mesh to domain in case caller did not
00112   move_to_domain( mesh, geom, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00113 
00114   const double P = 1.0;
00115   TagVertexMesh init_mesh( err, mesh ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00116   ReferenceMesh ref_mesh( &init_mesh );
00117   RefMeshTargetCalculator W( &ref_mesh );
00118   
00119   TShapeNB1 mu_s;
00120   TShapeSize2DNB1 mu_2d_ss;
00121   TShapeSize3DNB1 mu_3d_ss;
00122   TMixed mu_ss( &mu_2d_ss, &mu_3d_ss );
00123   TShapeSizeOrientNB1 mu_sso;
00124   TMetric* mu = 0;
00125   switch (metricType) {
00126     case SHAPE:             mu = &mu_s  ; break;
00127     case SHAPE_SIZE:        mu = &mu_ss ; break;
00128     case SHAPE_SIZE_ORIENT: mu = &mu_sso; break;
00129   }
00130 
00131   TQualityMetric sample_metric( &W, mu );
00132   ElementPMeanP elem_metric( P, &sample_metric );
00133   PMeanPTemplate obj_func( P, &elem_metric );
00134   
00135   TerminationCriterion inner, outer;
00136   SteepestDescent improver( &obj_func );
00137   improver.use_element_on_vertex_patch(); // Nash optimization
00138   inner.add_iteration_limit( DEFAULT_INNER_ITERATIONS );
00139   if (doCulling)
00140     inner.cull_on_absolute_vertex_movement_edge_length( movementFactor );
00141   else
00142     outer.add_absolute_vertex_movement_edge_length( movementFactor );
00143   if (cpuTime > 0.0)
00144     outer.add_cpu_time( cpuTime );
00145   improver.set_inner_termination_criterion( &inner );
00146   improver.set_outer_termination_criterion( &outer );
00147   
00148   qa->add_quality_assessment(&elem_metric);
00149   InstructionQueue q;
00150   q.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00151   q.set_master_quality_improver( &improver, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00152   q.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00153   q.run_common( mesh, pmesh, geom, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00154 }
00155 
00156 void DeformingDomainWrapper::move_to_domain( Mesh* mesh, 
00157                                              MeshDomain* geom, 
00158                                              MsqError& err )
00159 {
00160   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts;
00161   mesh->get_all_vertices( verts, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00162   
00163   MsqVertex coords;
00164   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>::const_iterator i;
00165   for (i = verts.begin(); i != verts.end(); ++i) {
00166     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( &*i, &coords, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00167     geom->snap_to( *i, coords );
00168     mesh->vertex_set_coordinates( *i, coords, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00169   }
00170 }

00172 DeformingCurveSmoother::DeformingCurveSmoother()
00173   : metricType(DEFAULT_CURVE_TYPE), initFractTag(DEFAULT_CURVE_TAG)
00174   {}
00175 
00176 DeformingCurveSmoother::~DeformingCurveSmoother()
00177   {}

00179 void DeformingCurveSmoother::store_initial_mesh( Mesh* mesh,
00180                                                  const Mesh::VertexHandle* verts,
00181                                                  int nverts,
00182                                                  CurveDomain* geom,
00183                                                  MsqError& err )
00184 {
00185   if (nverts < 2) {
00186     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid curve mesh.  Need at least two end vertices.",
00187                     MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00188     return;
00189   }
00190 
00191   // get edge lengths
00192   std::vector<double> vals(nverts - 1);
00193   MsqVertex coords[2];
00194   int prev = 0;
00195   mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( verts, coords+prev, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00196   for (int i = 1; i < nverts; ++i) {
00197     int next = 1 - prev;
00198     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( verts+i, coords+next, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00199     vals[i-1] = (coords[0] - coords[1]).length();
00200     prev = next;
00201   }
00202   
00203   // convert to length fraction before each iterior vertex
00204   // (sum of lengths of adjacent edges over total curve length)
00205   const double total = std::accumulate( vals.begin(), vals.end(), 0.0 );
00206   for (int i = 1; i < nverts-1; ++i)
00207     vals[i-1] = vals[i-1]/total;
00208   vals.resize(nverts-2);
00209   
00210   // create tag
00211   TagHandle tag = mesh->tag_create( initFractTag, Mesh::DOUBLE, 1, 0, err );
00212   if (err.error_code() == MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS) {
00213     err.clear();
00214     tag = get_tag( mesh, err ); 
00215   }
00216   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00217   
00218   // store tag data on interior vertices
00219   mesh->tag_set_vertex_data( tag, nverts-2, verts+1, &vals[0], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00220 }
00221 
00222 void DeformingCurveSmoother::smooth_curve( Mesh* mesh,
00223                                            const Mesh::VertexHandle* verts,
00224                                            int nverts,
00225                                            CurveDomain* geom,
00226                                            Scheme type,
00227                                            MsqError& err )
00228 {
00229   if (nverts < 2) {
00230     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid curve mesh.  Need at least two end vertices.",
00231                     MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00232     return;
00233   }
00234 
00235   // Verify that end vertices are on curve.  We cannot snap end vertices
00236   // to ends of curve for application because we don't know where the
00237   // ends of the curve are.
00238   MsqVertex coords[2], coords2;
00239   Mesh::VertexHandle ends[2] = { verts[0], verts[nverts-1] };
00240   for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {
00241     mesh->vertices_get_coordinates( ends+i, coords+i, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00242     geom->position_from_length( coords[i].to_array(), 0, coords2.to_array(), err );
00243     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00244     if ((coords[i] - coords2).length_squared() > DBL_EPSILON) {
00245       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Curve end vertices do not line on curve.  Move ends to curve end points first",
00246                       MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00247       return;
00248     }
00249   }
00250   const double total = geom->arc_length( coords[0].to_array(), coords[1].to_array(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00251   
00252   std::vector<double> vals(nverts-1);
00253   if (metricType == EQUAL) {
00254     std::fill( vals.begin(), vals.end(), 1.0/(nverts-1) );
00255     //fracsum = 1.0;
00256   }
00257   else { // metricType == PROPORTIONAL
00258     TagHandle tag = get_tag( mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00259     mesh->tag_get_vertex_data( tag, nverts-2, verts+1, &vals[0], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00260     double sum = std::accumulate( vals.begin(), vals.end()-1, 0.0 ); 
00261     if (1.0 - sum > 1e-8)
00262       vals.back() = 1.0 - sum;
00263     else {
00264       vals.back() = *std::min_element( vals.begin(), vals.end()-1 );
00265       sum += vals.back();
00266       for (size_t i = 0; i < vals.size(); ++i)
00267         vals[i] /= sum;
00268     }
00269   }
00270   
00271   double frac_sum = 0.0;
00272   for (int i = 1; i < nverts-1; ++i) {
00273     frac_sum += vals[i-1];
00274     geom->position_from_length( coords[0].to_array(), total * frac_sum, coords[1].to_array(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00275     mesh->vertex_set_coordinates( verts[i], coords[1], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00276   }
00277 }
00278 
00279 TagHandle DeformingCurveSmoother::get_tag( Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00280 {
00281   TagHandle h = mesh->tag_get( initFractTag, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00282   std::string name;
00283   Mesh::TagType type;
00284   unsigned len;
00285   mesh->tag_properties( h, name, type, len, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00286   if (type != Mesh::DOUBLE || len != 1) {
00287     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_MESH,
00288                     "Tag \"%s\" exists but is not 1 double value per vertex.",
00289                     initFractTag.c_str());
00290   }
00291   return h;
00292 }
